WorkItem.Description: When a build from source is done using r24408, running the program results in a prompt to update to 2.0.1
WorkItem.Summary: Build from source with r24408 results in a prompt to update

Comments.Message: Yeah, Change Set 24088 was build 2.0.0.  v2.0.1 has been released.  The latest change set, 24149, is build 2.0.1.  Sorry, not sure what you're expecting.
